SEARCH
Module gamecritic
Package reviews

Class Review

java.lang.Object
reviews.Review
Direct Known Subclasses:
DetailedReview
public class Review extends Object
Represents review made by user on a game, acts as data model for handling review information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Review

      public Review(int id, int gameId, int userId, int score, String reviewText, String publishDate)
      Constructs new review with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - identifier of the review
      gameId - identifier of game being reviewed
      userId - identifier of user who wrote the review
      score - score awarded by the reviewer
      reviewText - text content of the review
      publishDate - date when the review was published, formatted as string
